name: Amber Flower
description:
A strange illness descended upon the meadow land after Imps have stolen the Amber Flower, a magical treasure from the Fairy Kingdom. A boy with a pure heart might be able to help them and free his family from their ill state.

Amber Flower is a short traditional platformer developed for #gbjam 4 .

Controls

Arrow Keys (Left and Right) - Move
Arrow Key (Down) - Grab Object
X - Throw, Attack*
Z - Jump
Space - Skip Messages, Talk with NPCS

* Up Key + X and Down Key + X (on air) executes upward and downward attacks

Follow me at @CrownoO
